pullRequest.title: Handle conditional access.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Handle conditional access in aad.
Reference documents https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/reference-aadsts-error-codes

nodes.bodyText: this.oauth2ErrorConverter.setErrorConverter(errorConverter); can execute only one time, not on every execution of handleError. And variable errorConverter can be deleted.
These variable used only one time, can be deleted and use string directly.
Please confirm whether suberror is right. Maybe is should be sub_error.
Can we write unit-test for hasError and handleError?

To make it work, please:

Write a new java class named AzureOAuth2AuthorizationRequestResolver, just like AADOAuth2AuthorizationRequestResolver.
Update AzureOAuth2Configuration.configure(...)

commit.message:
Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java into handle_conditional_access

# Conflicts:
#	sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot/src/main/java/com/azure/spring/aad/webapp/AzureOAuth2Configuration.java
